message:
Welcome!
You are on imageboard.
Imageboard is a type of Internet forum which operates mostly via posting images.
This imageboard supports JPEG and PNG formats.

You can also "reply" to post, by making link on it. Link looks like >>[message number].
Example: >>1.
When you click on the link, you will be taken to the post.

>>50
This is an reply to a post that does not exist, it is not a link. As soon as this post appears, the reply becomes a link.
All this works on React + Node.js, you can find the source code by the link: github.com/VasylievIvan/nodeboard(still on work).
You can click on image preview to see the full size image.
